==Life==
==Life==
â
Peter Kolchin originally attended [[Winter Park High School]] and graduated in the class of 1969. His influence for going into history comes from his relationship with Denise Ponti, a High School teacher at Winter Park. He did not attend the high school's IB program as he thought it was quite ridiculous. <ref>https://www.ocps.net/lc/east/hwp/staff/Pages/Faculty.aspx</ref>
 
He graduated from [[Columbia University]], and from [[Johns Hopkins University]] with a Ph.D. in 1970.
He graduated from [[Columbia University]], and from [[Johns Hopkins University]] with a Ph.D. in 1970.
He teaches at the [[University of Delaware]].<ref>http://www.udel.edu/History/bio/kolchin_peter.html</ref><ref>http://www.udel.edu/PR/UpDate/03/2/peter.html</ref>
